knimeNode.name: Kruskal-Wallis Test
knimeNode.shortDescription: Performs the Kurskal-Wallis-Test independent group test on multiple groups.

fullDescription.intro: The non-paramatric independent Kruskal-Wallis-Test tests if several groups with ordinal attributes are statistically different of each other. For details see: Kruskal-Wallis-Test on Wikipedia .

tab.name: Options
tab.option:
Determine a strategy how missing values and Double.NaN values are treated.
Fixed: Missing values will be replaced with Double.NaN.
Failed: Exception is thrown and node will not finish execution.
Maximal: Missing values are considered to be maximal in the ranking.
Minimal: Missing values are considered to be minimal in the ranking.
